Tyrael looked satisfied.

Tyrael: I take it that the ship is good to go. We'll wait for Talon to 
get aboard.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Let me alter that slightly.
> 
> Shadow Star:  Dinotherms connected, infercells up, megathrusters are 
> go.
> 
> OOC: It's what they said when they formed "Voltron: Defender of the 
> Universe" so I couldn't resist.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael started to get on the Night Star. He stood in the doorway, 
> and 
> > received a signal that all the pods were inside. He called for the 
> > soldiers not already aboard.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Naga, Talon, we will wait for both of you on the bridge of 
> the 
> > ship. Shadow Star, tell me when all systems are operational 
please.
> > 
> > He walks slowly to the bridge. Soon, he would have to make his 
> report 
> > to the High Council before going. Upon their shoulder rested the 
> very 
> > future of the Tripredacus... Life really was a bitch...
